name: mapView
title: Map
description: A data list that supports Add, Edit and Delete operations.

properties.name: name
properties.title: Name
properties.description: How do you want to name your list?

properties.name: parent
properties.description: To which view do you want to add the list?

properties.name: dataProvider
properties.title: Provider
properties.description: To which data provider do you want to bind the list?
properties.note: To manage Data Providers, go to the Data Tab.

properties.name: collection
properties.title: Content type
properties.description: What is the name of your data collection?
properties.note: To manage Data Providers, go to the Data Tab.

properties.name: collectionProvider
properties.title: Content
properties.description: What is the name of your content provider for this content type (leave empty to use default one)?

properties.name: headerField
properties.title: Heading text
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as heading text?

properties.name: iconField
properties.title: Icon
properties.description: Do you want to add an icon to every item?

properties.name: imageField
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as image? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: subHeaderField
properties.title: Subheading text
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as subheading text? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: pullToRefresh
properties.title: Pull to refresh
properties.description: Do you want to enable pull-to-refresh functionality?
properties.hint: Enable manual refresh of the list data by pulling the view down from the top.

properties.name: endlessScroll
properties.title: Load on demand
properties.description: Do you want to enable endless scrolling?
properties.hint: Enable loading the next page of data when the user scrolls near the bottom of the view.

properties.name: filterField
properties.title: Filtering
properties.description: Which field from the data source do you want to use for filtering? Leave empty to omit.
properties.hint: Enable filtering of the list items by matching user input to a specified text field from the data source.

properties.name: group
properties.title: Grouping
properties.description: Which field from the data source do you want to use for grouping? Leave empty to omit.
properties.hint: Enable grouping of the list items by specified text field from the data source.

properties.name: deleteItemButton
properties.title: Deleting Items
properties.description: Do you want to enable deleting existing data items?
properties.hint: Show a 'Delete' button on selected items.

properties.name: deleteItemConfirmation
properties.title: Ask for confirmation
properties.description: Do you want to show a confirmation dialog when deleting items?
properties.hint: Show a confirmation dialog when deleting items.

properties.name: detailHeaderField
properties.title: Heading text
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as heading text in the details view? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: detailSubHeaderField
properties.title: Subheading text
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as subheading text in the details view? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: detailDescriptionField
properties.title: Description
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as description in the details view? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: detailImageField
properties.title: Image
properties.description: Which field of the data collection do you want to use as image in the details view? Leave empty to omit.

properties.name: addItemForm
properties.title: Add Item Form
properties.description: Do you want to enable adding of new data items?
properties.hint: Show an 'Add' button allowing the user to add new data items.

properties.name: editItemForm
properties.title: Edit Item Form
properties.description: Do you want to enable editing of existing data items?
properties.hint: Show an 'Edit' button on selected items.

properties.name: components
properties.title: Editing forms
properties.description: Your list supports the following editing forms.
